long_description: Carry up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards on your roof rack with this newly redesigned, affordable and easy-to-use Yakima Big Powderhound classic mount. 1-button access makes it simple to operate even with gloves on. Soft rubber pads gently cradle skis and boards. Integrated binding lift gives you optimal clearance between car roof and bindings. Easy installation with included hex wrench means you're on your way to the slopes in no time. Universal mounting hardware fits round, square and most factory crossbars right out of the box. Lockable with included SKS locks and keys. Yakima Big Powderhound mounts cannot be removed from crossbars when closed and locked. Usable pad length = 22.5 in.
short_description: Carry up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards on your roof rack with this newly redesigned, affordable and easy-to-use Yakima Big Powderhound classic mount.
